About Us

SY Medical Products

Since 1992, we have been providing reliable, innovative and high-quality solutions in the healthcare sector.

Who We Are?

SY Medical Products Company was founded in 1992 with the aim of providing reliable, innovative and high-quality solutions in the healthcare sector.

We supply and sell medical products such as disposable balloons, stents, catheters and guide wires in cardiology, radiology, neurology, anesthesia, urology, cardiovascular surgery, dialysis and general surgery.

With our approach that prioritizes patient safety and treatment success, we provide effective, reliable and sustainable solutions to healthcare professionals.

With a quality-oriented approach that closely follows technology and is committed to ethical values, we continue to add value to the healthcare sector in our country and international markets.

SY

Our Vision

To be one of the leading brands in the medical sector in Turkey and around the world with innovative and reliable products that put human health at its center.

We aim to become the first choice of healthcare professionals with our service approach based on quality, technology and ethical values.

Our Mission

As SY Medical Products Company;

  • Prioritize high quality and reliability in disposable medical products
  • Provide effective and innovative solutions
  • Base on patient safety and treatment success
  • Contribute to the sustainable development of healthcare services

Our Values

The core values that define how we work

Trust

We prioritize patient and physician safety above all.

Quality

We provide products and services at international standards.

Innovation

We follow health technologies and put innovation at our center.

Ethics

We are committed to honesty, transparency and ethical responsibility.

Collaboration

We build strong partnerships with healthcare professionals.

Responsibility

We are responsible to society, environment and our stakeholders.

Quality Policy

As SY Medical Products Company, in every product and service we offer to our customers:

  • Full compliance with national and international quality standards
  • Continuous improvement and customer satisfaction as fundamental principles
  • Continuously developing our employees' knowledge, skills and sense of responsibility
  • Conducting ethical, safe and sustainable business processes
  • Building long-term trust relationships in the healthcare sector

"Our goal is to make quality not just a target, but an indispensable value of our corporate culture."

Your reliable partner in disposable medical products. We provide service without compromising on quality and hygiene standards.
